subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: John Tavares scored a go-ahead goal late in the second period, and the Islanders overcame a quick scoring spurt by Edmonton’s Taylor Hall in a 3-2 victory over the visiting Oilers.
snippet: John Tavares scored a go-ahead goal late in the second period, and the Islanders overcame a quick scoring spurt by Edmonton’s Taylor Hall in a 3-2 victory over the visiting Oilers.
